Ok ppl, theres  bug in the patch. All you have to do is Right-click the file "patch.bat" > Edit and copy all this:"
@echo off
echo Patching EGirl 1.5...
cat -l 0x210000 egirl15.bin -o 0x210000 -l 0x2187000 egirl.exe -o 0x210000 egirl15.bin egirl.exe.new
del /f /q egirl.exe.bak
ren egirl.exe egirl.exe.new
echo done"


then rename the ...Exe.New to .exe and run it in the game's root directory.

OK people listen everybody. There is indeed a bug in the patch, I've fixed it.
Replace your patch.bat with the following lines (without cut here/end here lines):
----CUT HERE----
@echo off
del /f /q egirl.exe.new
del /f /q egirl.exe.bak

echo Patching EGirl...
cat egirl15.bin -o 0x212000 -l 0x2187000 egirl.exe egirl.exe.new
move egirl.exe.new egirl.exe
----END HERE----
